_header: I heard men upon mold make much moan
Subjects: political poems; evils of the time; contemporary conditions; laments; taxation
_description: The Song of the Husbandman — six 12-line alliterative stanzas (ababababcdcd)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Ich herde men vpo mold make muche monHou he beþ itened of here
                    tilyynge…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Þer wakeneþ in þe world wondred ant weeAse god
                    is swynden anon as so forte swynke
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line in the MS.
